md:text-5xl font-bold text-white mb-4","children":"Advanced Agent Patterns"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-xl text-gray-400 mb-6","children":"Learn advanced patterns for building robust, production-ready AI agents."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"text-sm text-gray-500","children":["Last updated: ","Feb 7, 2026"]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose prose-invert prose-lg max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Advanced Agent Patterns"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Master advanced techniques for building production-ready AI agents."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Pattern 1: Chain of Thought"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Break complex tasks into reasoning steps:"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"async function chainOfThought(problem) {\n  const steps = await agent.think({\n    task: problem,\n    strategy: 'break-down'\n  })\n\n  const results = []\n  for (const step of steps) {\n    const result = await agent.execute(step)\n    results.push(result)\n  }\n\n  return agent.synthesize(results)\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Pattern 2: Self-Correction"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Let agents verify and fix their own outputs:"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"async function selfCorrect(task) {\n  let attempts = 0\n  let result = await agent.execute(task)\n\n  while (attempts < 3) {\n    const verification = await agent.verify(result)\n\n    if (verification.correct) {\n      return result\n    }\n\n    result = await agent.fix(result, verification.issues)\n    attempts++\n  }\n\n  throw new Error('Failed after 3 attempts')\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Pattern 3: Multi-Agent Collaboration"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"const researcher = new Agent({ role: 'researcher' })\nconst coder = new Agent({ role: 'coder' })\nconst reviewer = new Agent({ role: 'reviewer' })\n\nasync function collaborate(task) {\n  const research = await researcher.execute(task)\n  const code = await coder.execute(research)\n  const review = await reviewer.execute(code)\n\n  if (review.approved) {\n    return code\n  } else {\n    return coder.execute({ code, feedback: review })\n  }\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Pattern 4: Memory Management"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"class AgentMemory {\n  constructor(maxSize = 10000) {\n    this.shortTerm = []\n    this.longTerm = new VectorStore()\n    this.maxSize = maxSize\n  }\n\n  async remember(item) {\n    this.shortTerm.push(item)\n\n    if (this.shortTerm.length > this.maxSize) {\n      // Move to long-term memory\n      const old = this.shortTerm.shift()\n      await this.longTerm.store(old)\n    }\n  }\n\n  async recall(query) {\n    // Search both memories\n    const recent = this.shortTerm.filter(matches(query))\n    const relevant = await this.longTerm.query(query)\n\n    return [...recent, ...relevant]\n  }\n}\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Pattern 5: Fallback Strategies"}],"\n",["$","pre",null,{"className":"bg-gray-800 rounded-lg overflow-hidden mb-4","children":["$","code",null,{"className":"block bg-gray-800 text-gray-300 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-x-auto mb-4 font-mono text-sm","children":"async function withFallback(task, strategies) {\n  for (const strategy of strategies) {\n    try {\n      return await strategy.execute(task)\n    } catch (error) {\n      console.log(`Strategy ${strategy.name} failed, trying next...`)\n    }\n  }\n\n  throw new Error('All strategies failed')\n}\n\n// Usage\nawait withFallback(task, [\n  new GPT4Strategy(),\n  new ClaudeStrategy(),\n  new FallbackHumanStrategy()\n])\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Best Practices"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Always validate inputs"}]," - Agents can be unpredictable"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Implement timeouts"}]," - Prevent infinite loops"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Log everything"}]," - Debugging agents is hard"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Test extensively"}]," - Unit test your agent behaviors"]}],"\n",["$","li","li-4",{"children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Monitor in production"}]," - Watch for drift and failures"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"These patterns form the foundation of robust AI agent systems. Combine them to build sophisticated, reliable agents."}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-12 p-6 rounded-lg bg-blue-500/10 border border-blue-500/20","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mb-2","children":"Was this guide helpful?"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-400 mb-4","children":"Let us know your thoughts or ask questions in our community."}],["$","$L2",null,{"href":"/contact","className":"inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 rounded-lg bg-blue-600 text-white font-medium hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors","children":"Give Feedback"}]]}]]}]]}]],null],null]},["$","$L3",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","guides","children","$4","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L5",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},["$","$L3",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children","guides","children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","errorScripts":"$undefined","template":["$","$L5",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","templateScripts":"$undefined","notFound":"$undefined","notFoundStyles":"$undefined","styles":null}],null]},[["$","html",null,{"lang":"en","className":"dark","children":[["$","head",null,{"children":["$","script",null,{"type":"application/ld+json","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"{\"@context\":\"https://schema.org\",\"@type\":\"WebSite\",\"name\":\"AI
